mapper.select: select * from sponDetail where userId=#{userId} order by created desc
mapper.insert: insert into sponDetail(USERID, DETAIL, CREATED, NUMPRO, ACTIONTYPE, DESCRIPTION, STATUS,sponNum) values(#{userId},#{detail},SYSDATE,#{numPro},#{actiontype},#{description},#{status},#{sponNum})
mapper.select: select * from sponDetail where created = to_date(#{created},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS')
mapper.update: update sponDetail set status=#{status} where created=to_date(#{created},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') and userId=#{userId}
update sponDetail set status=#{status} where sponNum=#{sponNum}
